name: Diskoteka
description:
Jump on the blocks, collect stars, and try to go as far as possible in this simple colorful game.

You will face the black monsters, deadly spikes, discharges, and other hazards. How far you can go depends on your skill.

How to play:

● Tap the screen and hold. When you decide that it is ready to jump, let go of your finger. The stronger Pinky Ponky shrinks the further he jumps.

♥ We hope to see your name on the leaderboard! ♥
